LanguageData.ToxicFallout.label: spore cloud
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.description: A plume of spores from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will be slowly infected, and items left outside will corrode.
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.descriptionFuture: a cloud of infectious spores will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor plant and animal life and infecting those exposed for too long.
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.endMessage: The worst of the infectious spores has settled.
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.letterText:
A distant chemical fire has aerosolized fragments of infectious RNA creating a plume of poison over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the infectious spores settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a quadrum.
